buildCommand: cd app && corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.15.9 --activate && pnpm install --network-timeout=600000 && pnpm build
installCommand: cd app && corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.15.9 --activate && pnpm install --network-timeout=600000 --fetch-retries=5 --fetch-retry-mintimeout=20000 --fetch-retry-maxtimeout=120000
